==Abilities and Attacks==
''Names are unofficial.''

===Normal===
*'''Slash:''' Performs a quick upward or downward close-range slash, dealing '''80% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}.
*'''Double Slash:''' Performs two sweeps with their katana, dealing {{Color|Physical DMG}}.
*'''Slash Combo:''' Unsheathes their katana to unleash a flurry of slashes, dealing '''85% ATK * 2''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}.
*'''Sword Thrust:''' Lunges toward the player with their katana, dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}} along their path.
**'''Variant 1:''' Readies their weapon on the hilt before dash-slashing at the player.
**'''Variant 2:''' Points their blade towards the player and charge towards them.
*'''Block:''' Assumes a defensive stance, temporarily blocking attacks from the direction they're facing.
*'''Dodge:''' Jumps backwards, away from the player.

===Hues of the Violet Garden===
In the [[Hues of the Violet Garden/Clash of Lone Blades|Hues of the Violet Garden]] event, the Yoriki Samurai named Yasuhiko Tarou will not perform '''Double Slash''' or '''Sword Thrust Variant 1''', but gains the following abilities:

*'''RES Increase:''' Swings their blade to taunt the player and gains a '''80%''' increase in [[Physical RES]]. This state will expire after 10s, or when the player performs a Perfect Parry against their '''Strong Counterattack'''.
*'''Strong Counterattack:''' If attacked continuously, performs two slashes, dealing '''40% ATK''' and '''80% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}.

===A Strange and Friendless Road===
In [[Kaedehara Kazuha]]'s [[Story Quest]] [[Acer Palmatum Chapter]] Act 1, [[A Strange and Friendless Road]], a unique variant of the Yoriki Samurai is encountered. He is equipped with the [[Prized Isshin Blade (Awakened)]].

*'''Superdash:''' Points their blade towards the player and performs an extremely fast forward lunge, dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}.
*'''Slash:''' Performs a quick upward or downward close-range slash, dealing '''80% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}. This attack is only used during the first encounter.
*'''Slash Combo:''' Performs performs two slashes, dealing '''40% ATK''' and '''80% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}. This attack is only used during the second encounter.
*'''Kazuha Slash:''' Sheathes their blade and [[Vacuum Field|sucks]] in nearby players before performing a sweeping slash, creating an Autumn Whirlwind field infused with {{Electro}} akin to Kaedehara Kazuha's [[Kazuha Slash]]. The field deals '''30% ATK''' as {{Color|AoE Electro DMG}} once every second 5 times.
